about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Learn more about my journey, passion, and creative process
about.storyContent: Welcome! I'm Inanilux, a passionate Pokémon artist and content creator based in Madrid. My journey with Pokémon started years ago, and it has evolved into a beautiful creative adventure. I specialize in fan art, GO Fest coverage, travel experiences, and custom commissions.
about.digitalIllustration: Digital illustration and Pokémon fan art
about.goFest: GO Fest and Pokémon event coverage
about.funFactContent: I've been a Pokémon fan since childhood and my favorite Pokémon changes with the seasons.
